# 泡学启示录

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/paoxue-qishilu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/paoxue-qishilu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install paoxue-qishilu
paoxue-qishilu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g paoxue-qishilu
paoxue-qishilu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
